Text.Page:
My husband, {@LinkCreature:227#1019#Jordal}, recently joined the garrison. We had little time for farewells. Would you take this necklace to him at Castra Mysterium?

Tell him that he is loved and constantly in my thoughts.

Remember her? If things don't get better, she's going to have to remember me! I'm supposed to report to Castra Mysterium, and I won't make it alive. Not without help.

Could you clear a path through the {@LinkCreature:27#1#loamy sporewalkers} and let {@LinkCreature:227#1006#Ellahne} know we haven't deserted, that we're not cowards?

Hmph. Excuses don't make up for missing a movement. Jordal knows where we're at. He should make his way here with all due speed.

Perhaps now that you've done his fighting for him, he'll at least show up.
